snippet: Prosecutors said Duvale Stevens had stabbed Andrea Hurd more than two dozen times after they got into an argument.
abstract: Duvale Stevens, in New York State Supreme Court, is sentenced to 25 years in prison following guilty plea in connection with fatal stabbing of Andrea Hurd in 2013 in Melrose section of Bronx.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Duvale Stevens had stabbed Andrea Hurd more than two dozen times after they got into an argument.

headline.main: Bronx Man Who Killed Friend Then Threw Her Off Roof Gets 25 Years
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Gets  25-Year Sentence  in Fatal Stabbing
